start_message:
Hello! I am the most advanced *Artificial Intelligence* in the world (created by OpenAI). I can assist with *various tasks*. For instance:

- Composing social media posts, essays, or emails
- Coding assistance, including writing and debugging
- Creating artwork
- Translating text into any language more effectively than Google Translate
- Solving homework assignments
- Proofreading text for errors
- Acting as your personal psychologist

... Essentially, I am capable of *anything*!
